phoneitems.description_short: The iPhone 13 Pro is Apple's latest flagship offering, boasting an advanced camera system and powerful performance.
phoneitems.description_long: The iPhone 13 Pro is the pinnacle of Apple's smartphone lineup, featuring a stunning Super Retina XDR display, Pro camera system with advanced computational photography, and the lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip. Its premium design, combined with the latest iOS features, ensures an unparalleled user experience.

phoneitems.description_short: The Galaxy S21 Ultra is Samsung's ultimate smartphone experience, featuring an incredible camera setup and super smooth display.
phoneitems.description_long: The Galaxy S21 Ultra sets a new benchmark for premium smartphones, with its 108MP camera, 100x Space Zoom, and 120Hz Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. Its powerful Exynos 2100 or Snapdragon 888 processor ensures smooth performance, while its sleek design and versatile S Pen compatibility cater to every need.

phoneitems.description_short: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a flagship killer with its Hasselblad camera system and fast charging capabilities.
phoneitems.description_long: The OnePlus 9 Pro redefines flagship smartphones with its Hasselblad camera system, delivering stunning photography and video capabilities. Its Snapdragon 888 processor and Warp Charge 65T ensure blazing-fast performance and charging speeds, while OxygenOS provides a clean, customizable user experience.

phoneitems.description_short: The Google Pixel 6 Pro offers a superior camera experience and seamless Android integration.
phoneitems.description_long: The Google Pixel 6 Pro boasts a cutting-edge camera system with advanced computational photography features. Its smooth performance, thanks to the Tensor chip, and Google's commitment to timely updates make it a top choice for Android enthusiasts.

phoneitems.description_short: The Xiaomi Mi 12 combines powerful performance with innovative features at an affordable price.
phoneitems.description_long: The Xiaomi Mi 12 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor and a high-refresh-rate display, offering a smooth user experience. With its versatile camera setup and MIUI 13, it delivers exceptional value for money.

phoneitems.description_short: The Sony Xperia 1 III offers professional-grade photography and cinematic display quality.
phoneitems.description_long: The Sony Xperia 1 III features a 4K OLED display with HDR support, perfect for cinematic viewing experiences. Its triple camera system with ZEISS optics delivers exceptional image quality, making it a favorite among photography enthusiasts.
features: Triple camera system with ZEISS optics

phoneitems.description_short: The Huawei P50 Pro excels in photography and offers a premium design with innovative features.
phoneitems.description_long: The Huawei P50 Pro features an impressive quad-camera setup developed in collaboration with Leica, delivering stunning photography results. Its elegant design, powered by HarmonyOS, offers a unique user experience.

phoneitems.description_short: The Motorola Edge X30 combines flagship performance with a sleek design at an affordable price point.
phoneitems.description_long: The Motorola Edge X30 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor and a 144Hz AMOLED display, offering smooth performance and vibrant visuals. Its versatile camera system and long-lasting battery make it ideal for everyday use.

phoneitems.description_short: The Realme GT 2 Pro offers flagship-level performance and features at an affordable price.
phoneitems.description_long: The Realme GT 2 Pro features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor and a high-refresh-rate Super AMOLED display, delivering smooth performance and vibrant visuals. Its versatile camera system and fast charging capabilities make it a compelling choice.
features: Super AMOLED display with high refresh rate

phoneitems.description_short: The Oppo Find X5 Pro offers cutting-edge technology and elegant design, perfect for discerning users.
phoneitems.description_long: The Oppo Find X5 Pro features a Hasselblad-developed camera system and a QHD+ AMOLED display, delivering exceptional photography and viewing experiences. Its sleek design and ColorOS 12 provide a premium user experience.

phoneitems.description_short: The Asus ROG Phone 6 is a gaming powerhouse with advanced features tailored for gaming enthusiasts.
phoneitems.description_long: The Asus ROG Phone 6 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor and a 144Hz AMOLED display, offering smooth gaming performance and immersive visuals. Its innovative gaming-centric features make it the ultimate choice for mobile gamers.

phoneitems.description_short: The Nokia X100 offers a pure Android experience and reliable performance at an affordable price.
phoneitems.description_long: The Nokia X100 features a Snapdragon 480 processor and a large display, providing a smooth and immersive user experience. Its clean Android interface and robust build quality make it a dependable choice for everyday use.

phoneitems.description_short: The Lenovo Legion Phone Duel 3 offers unrivaled gaming performance and innovative design for gaming enthusiasts.
phoneitems.description_long: The Lenovo Legion Phone Duel 3 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor and a 144Hz AMOLED display, delivering smooth gaming performance and immersive visuals. Its unique landscape design and gaming-centric features make it a standout choice for mobile gamers.

phoneitems.description_short: The BlackBerry Key3 combines productivity features with a physical keyboard for users who prioritize efficiency.
phoneitems.description_long: The BlackBerry Key3 features a modern design with a full physical keyboard, ideal for users who prefer tactile typing. Its suite of productivity-focused software and robust security features ensure a secure and efficient user experience.

catitems.description_short: The Realme GT 2 Pro offers flagship-level performance and features at an affordable price.
catitems.description_long: The Realme GT 2 Pro features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor and a high-refresh-rate Super AMOLED display, delivering smooth performance and vibrant visuals. Its versatile camera system and fast charging capabilities make it a compelling choice.
features: Super AMOLED display with high refresh rate

phoneItems.description_long: The OnePlus 9 Pro redefines flagship smartphones with its Hasselblad camera system, delivering stunning photography and video capabilities. Its Snapdragon 888 processor and Warp Charge 65T ensure blazing-fast performance and charging speeds, while OxygenOS provides a clean, customizable user experience.

phoneItems.description_long: The Sony Xperia 1 III features a 4K OLED display with HDR support, perfect for cinematic viewing experiences. Its triple camera system with ZEISS optics delivers exceptional image quality, making it a favorite among photography enthusiasts.
